license mit doc proposed readme phpunit bridge  provides utility phpunit especially user deprecation notice management come following feature disable garbage collector auto register class_exists load doctrine annotation print user deprecation notice summary end test suite handling user deprecation notice sensitive environment variable env var configures behavior depending value set strict legacy tagged deprecation notice make test fail recommended mode best forward compatibility weak contrary make test ignore deprecation notice recommended mode legacy project must use deprecated interface backward compatibility reason value respect current error reporting level three mode display summary deprecation notice end test suite split two group legacy deprecation notice denote test explicitly test legacy interface mode deprecation notice triggered legacy tagged test never make test fail four way mark test legacy make class start legacy prefix make method start testlegacy make data provider start providelegacy getlegacy add group legacy annotation class method remaining deprecation notice non legacy notice grouped message test class method usage  add bridge require dev section composer.json file require e.g composer require dev symfony phpunit bridge running phpunit see summary deprecation notice end test suite deprecation notice remaining section need thought decide either update code use deprecated interface anymore thus gaining better forward compatibility move legacy section using one way reviewing silence deprecation legacy section think triggered test dedicated
